errors.tackIsNotAvailable: Sorry, this Tack is no longer available

validationErrors.invalidLogin: Provide a valid phone # or email address

defaultAlert.title: Warning
defaultAlert.message: Sorry, smth went wrong, try again.

cancelOffer.message:
Are you sure want to <colored>Cancel Offer</colored>
 <highlight>{tackName}</highlight>

deleteAccount.message:
Are you sure you want to 
<colored>Delete Your Account</colored>?

offerSent.title: Offer Sent
offerSent.message: We will notify you if the offer is accepted

offerAccepted.title: Offer Accepted
offerAccepted.message: Need someone to Re-string my Fender Strat...

inGroupNow.message:
You are now a member of 
 <highlight-colored>{groupName}</highlight-colored>

noMoreGroupMember.message:
You are no longer a member of 
<highlight>{groupName}</highlight>

groupCreated.title: New Group Created
groupCreated.message:
Click below to invite members to
<highlight-colored>{groupName}</highlight-colored>

newGroupRequested.title: New Group Requested...
newGroupRequested.message: We will notify you via text if the new group is accepted (1-2 days)

signUpScreen.title: Personal Information
signUpScreen.termsPrivacyAgreement: Agree to Terms & Conditions & Privacy Policy

signUp.title: Verify Phone Number
signUp.description: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to <highlight>{phoneNumber}</highlight>

recovery.title: Enter Recovery Code
recovery.description: Please enter the 6-digit recovery code sent to <highlight>{phoneNumber}</highlight>

notRegistered.title: Not Registered
notRegistered.description: Your phone number is not registered within our system. Please re-try or Sign Up by clicking below.

alreadyRegistered.title: Already Registered
alreadyRegistered.description: Your phone number is already registered within our system. Please Sign In by clicking below.

drawer.note: NOTE: This is an invite-only beta version of our app. Our official marketplace releases later this Fall. For more details, check out tackmarketplace.com

emptyNoGroupSelected.title: Join or Create Group
emptyNoGroupSelected.description: You must create or join a Tack group before creating or completing Tacks. Please click below to view current group invitations or to create a new group.

noTacks.description: Looks like this group doesn’t have any current Tacks. This will automatically populate as Tacks are created within this group. Create your own Tack below.

counterOfferScreen.priceInvalid: Counter price must be greater than listed price

tacksScreen.title: My Tacks
tacksScreen.subtitle: Ongoing Tacks
tacksScreen.description: Here are your ongoing Tacks (the ones you have created yourself or completing for others)

tackerTacks.description: Looks like you haven't created any currently ongoing Tacks. Go to the Create Tack page to create your next Tack.

runnerTacks.description: Looks like you aren't currently completing any Tacks. Go to the Home Feed to find and accept your next Tack.

groupsScreen.title: My Groups
groupsScreen.description: Select one of the following groups to switch your current app view

empty.description: Looks like your not currently part of any Tack groups. Please accept an invitation or create and share your own Tack group!

invitationsScreen.title: My Invitations
invitationsScreen.description: Here is a list of all Tack groups you have been invited to.

empty.description: Looks like you don’t have any current invitations at this time. If you were sent an invite link, please use it to view your group invitation now.

createGroupScreen.title: Create Group
createGroupScreen.description: Enter in the following details to create a group

createTackScreen.title: Create Tack
createTackScreen.description: Create custom Tack or select a popular template or frequent Tacks within your current group.

empty.description: Looks like this group doesn’t have any frequent Tacks. This will automatically populate as more Tacks are created within this group.
empty.noGroupSelectedDescription: You must be invited to a Tack group before creating or completing Tacks. If you were sent an invite link, please use it to view your invitation.

counterOfferSection.title: Allow Counteroffer
counterOfferSection.hint: If selected, a Runner will be able to counteroffer with an increased Tack price.

inviteMembersScreen.title: Invite Link
inviteMembersScreen.description: Copy or share this link to invite members to group

created.title: Notifying Runners...
created.subtitle: We will notify you when a Runner accepts your Tack

pendingAccept.title: Choose Runner...
pendingAccept.subtitle: Each Runner’s offer automatically expires after 15 min

pendingStart.title: Runner is Preparing...
pendingStart.subtitle: You will be notified when Runner begins Tack

inProgress.title: Runner is Completing Tack...
inProgress.subtitle: Runner is currently working on your Tack

pendingReview.title: Review Tack...
pendingReview.subtitle: Mark Tack as complete to transfer money to Runner
pendingReview.note: NOTE: Tack is automatically marked as complete and payment is sent after 12 hours

pendingStart.title: Tack Pending...
pendingStart.subtitle: Click below to begin and mark Tack as in-progress
pendingStart.note: NOTE: You can only have one in-progress Tack at a time. Please mark your current Tack as complete before beginning.

inProgress.title: Completing Tack...
inProgress.subtitle: Click below to mark Tack as complete
inProgress.note: NOTE: Payment will be sent once Tacker marks Tack as complete. Tack is automatically set to complete after 12 hours.

pendingReview.title: Pending Review...
pendingReview.subtitle: Waiting for Tacker to mark Tack as complete
pendingReview.note: NOTE: Payment will be sent once Tacker marks Tack as complete. Tack is automatically set to complete after 12 hours. You may complete other Tacks in the meantime.

addToTackBalanceFailedScreen.title: Deposit Failed
addToTackBalanceFailedScreen.description: We were unable to successfully process the deposit. Please try again in a few minutes.

addPaymentMethodFailedScreen.title: Unable To Add
addPaymentMethodFailedScreen.description: We were unable to add the payment method to your account. Please try again in a few minutes.
addPaymentMethodFailedScreen.depositoryDescription: We were unable to find a depository account linked with your bank. Please try again with a new bank.

withdrawFailedScreen.title: Withdraw Failed
withdrawFailedScreen.description: We were unable to successfully process the withdraw. Please try again in a few minutes.

paymentSettingsScreen.title: Payment Settings
paymentSettingsScreen.privacyInfo: Tack does not store any of your payment info

withdrawSuccessfulScreen.instantPayoutTitle:
We’re Working On
Your Instant Payout
withdrawSuccessfulScreen.instantPayoutSubtitle: This process can take up to 30 minutes
withdrawSuccessfulScreen.regularPayoutSubtitle: This process can take up to 3 business days

customerSupportScreen.title: Customer Support
customerSupportScreen.description: Our team will reach out to you as soon as possible with a response

createdTacks.description: Looks like you don’t haven’t created any previous Tacks. Go to the Create Tack page to create your first Tack.

completedTacks.description: Looks like you don’t haven’t completed any previous Tacks. Go to the Home Feed to find your first Tack to complete.
